files.help: Supported since version _1.21.0_. You can move the file to $XDG_CONFIG_HOME/mycli/myclirc

Supported since version _1.8.0_. Export the following environment variables:

```bash
export MYCLI_HISTFILE="$XDG_DATA_HOME/mycli/history"
```
The location for the log file can be set in the config file. See https://www.mycli.net/config
